title: Learn Next.js in 2025
metaDesc: Understand Next.js in 2025 with server-side rendering, static generation, and API routes.
content:
Next.js is a React framework that makes building production-ready apps much easier. It handles routing, API endpoints, and performance optimization out of the box.

Key Features

  1. File-based Routing
  2. Server-Side Rendering (SSR)
  3. Static Site Generation (SSG)
  4. API Routes

API Example

export default function handler(req, res) { res.status(200).json({ message: 'Hello from Next.js API!' }); }

Explore more at the official Next.js Docs.
